blackengine.rendering.pipeline.shaderPrograms

Class ShaderProgramBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackengine.rendering.pipeline.shaderPrograms.ShaderProgramBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MaterialShaderProgram, ProcessingShaderProgram

    public abstract class ShaderProgramBase
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShaderProgramBase(VertexShader vertexShader, FragmentShader fragmentShader)
      Default constructor for creating a new instance of ShaderProgram.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void applySettings()
      Sets the specific rendering settings for this shader program such as blending, depth testing and polygon mode.
      protected void bindAttribute(java.lang.String attributeName, int location)
      Binds the attribute name ('in' variable) to the given location for later reference.
      void destroy()
      Calls the member onDestroy() and then proceeds to destroy the shaders and deleting this program from the graphics card.
      protected Camera getCamera() 
      void initialize()
      Initializes the shader program by loading it and its shaders to the graphics card.
      abstract void loadFrameUniforms()
      Gets called before any instance of RenderComponent is rendered.
      void loadUniformBool(java.lang.String uniformName, boolean value)
      Loads a boolean value to the specified uniform.
      void loadUniformFloat(java.lang.String uniformName, float value)
      Loads a float value to the specified uniform.
      void loadUniformInteger(java.lang.String uniformName, int value)
      Loads an integer value to the specified uniform.
      void loadUniformMatrix(java.lang.String uniformName, org.lwjgl.util.vector.Matrix4f matrix)
      Loads a matrix to the uniform variable in the specified location by converting it to a float buffer first.
      void loadUniformVector2f(java.lang.String uniformName, ImmutableVector2 vector)
      Loads an instance of ImmutableVector2 to the specified uniform.
      void loadUniformVector2i(java.lang.String uniformName, int x, int y)
      Loads two integers into a uniform variable 'ivec2'.
      void loadUniformVector3f(java.lang.String uniformName, ImmutableVector3 vector)
      Loads an instance of ImmutableVector3 to the specified uniform.
      void loadUniformVector3i(java.lang.String uniformName, int x, int y, int z)
      Loads three integers into a uniform variable 'ivec3'.
      void onDestroy()
      Gets called just before the destroy method is called, while the shader program is still running.
      void revertSettings() 
      void start(Camera camera)
      Starts the shader program on the graphics card.
      void stop()
      Stops the shader program on the graphics card.
      protected void validate()
      Binds the attributes ('in' variables) and validates this program.

      • loadUniformMatrix

        public void loadUniformMatrix(java.lang.String uniformName,
                              org.lwjgl.util.vector.Matrix4f matrix)
        Loads a matrix to the uniform variable in the specified location by converting it to a float buffer first.
        Parameters:
        uniformName - The name of the uniform variable the matrix will be loaded into.
        matrix - The matrix that needs to be loaded into the uniform variable.

        Parameters:
        uniformName - The name of the uniform variable the values will be loaded into.
        x - The first value of the vector.
        y - The second value of the vector.
        z - The third value of the vector.
